comment: I like the app. However, there's only one issue. and if the update fixes it I'll rate this 5/5, Ok! my issue is when I just trying to export a song it just keeps backing it goes to the home page and when I try to repeat the situation it is just keep forcing to go to the home page, Please Fix (Thank You!)
scenarios: When trying to export a song, the app keeps returning to the home page, and when attempting to repeat the export, it continues to forcefully go back to the home page.
key sentence: When trying to export a song, the app keeps returning to the home page, and when attempting to repeat the export, it continues to forcefully go back to the home page.
the function of activity: This activity focuses on editing, exporting, adjusting, and managing the audio and video elements of multimedia templates.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Edit Template sound', 'description': 'Edit the sound of template.'}, {'name': 'Export the template project', 'description': 'Export the project of template.'}]
